author: setyotomo
title: Cardano Hub Indonesia-Video Series
description: Indonesians prefer simple visual infographics through videos to learn about Cardano in local language - Bahasa Indonesia

f6_assessments.q0: Viewers really enjoy and absorb information better from the video, I completely agree with the proposal of the project. Under the heading “Please describe your proposed solution”, you should be more specific about which part of the video content will provide information about Cardano to the community, I have a few suggestions as follows: basic concepts, how to invest, applications Practical application, updated information… The way you recognize the challenge and have a plan for it is quite reasonable, in addition, I would like to support you with an idea because it is a new youtube channel, the content quality is good and the number of videos is very important, in addition to building completely new videos, you can intertwine translating videos with useful content about Cardano, which will increase regular interaction with the community and does not take much time for video editing (note: remember to cite the source clearly)
f6_assessments.q1: The timelines are suitable for those just starting to work on video editing, the budget is clear and reasonable. Two team members I think is enough to finish the video editing, but I have one worry, to complete a video takes a lot of time and effort, so the content must be precise, I recommend you should combine with a few advisors who specialize in blockchain to make things more convenient and accurate, what do you think of this suggestion?
f6_assessments.q2: Subscriber count and view count are two very intuitive and easy quantifying metrics. In addition, you can provide more indicators of the number of videos, the total number of minutes taken, the communication channels to develop the community… And this proposal is a follow-up proposal in the previous Funds, an advantage big position.

f6_assessments.q0: Identify a challenging problem, large scale of impact. Indonesia is a large community. Therefore, the issue of providing the information of the Cardano ecosystem to them in Indonesian is essential for the Indonesian community to quickly grasp and understand Cardano more deeply. Identify a few problems of the challenge, make reasonable arguments. Creating youtube videos in Indonesian to capture the interest of the Indonesian community is a great solution. It helps to expand the Cardano community in Indonesia effectively, quickly, and sustainably. A number of risks have been raised, but no solution has been stated. I've seen them raise some difficult things like the new YouTube channel, it takes hours to complete the video. It would be great if this proposal was more clear about the difficulties they will face and there are some preventive solutions to those difficulties.
f6_assessments.q1:
Clear, reasonable timeline with specific goals. The proposal specifies the timelines for completing each stage to complete 1 video in a month, 6 videos within 6 months. This plan is perfectly suitable, with a very high probability of completion.

Fund proposals of less than 20%, some expenditures need to be clarified. The budget for each job has been specifically divided. But it would be great to be able to see all the jobs calculated by man-hours performed. It's easier to imagine if we look at the cost per man-hour.

Members are assigned; Appropriate experience; Identity is easy to authenticate. The members are the ones who build the Cardano community in Indonesia. They have experience building and managing communities. This is very beneficial in the construction and completion of this project.
f6_assessments.q2:
There are KPIs/indicators, but all of them is difficult to measure. The proposal outlines two criteria for the growth of youTube channel subscriptions and the increase in the number of people watching videos. If you can specify the specific number for each of these targets when completing 6 videos, it will be easier to visualize and follow.

Not yet defined success, not tested. I am well aware that they want to increase the number of members and people who are interested in the Cardano ecosystem in Indonesia. However, it would be a lot better if the proposal quantifies the number of views, the number of registrations after the completion of the project.
It has been funded but not related to this proposal. They have been funded for some proposals in fund 7. I checked the community links in their proposal and found this to be a really vibrant community, with a lot of information about Cardano being introduced to the community. They already have the right knowledge, experience, and community to develop their expansion.

f6_assessments.q0: A very clear explanation from the team about the goal to be achieved, namely explaining about cardano through learning videos that will attract everyone who is interested in learning cardano. The selection of Youtube media is also based on statistics provided for internet users in Indonesia. The steps to be taken are also very clear and structured. The content provided is based on the Cardano Indonesia Community Syllabus posted on the cardano indonesia forum.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal provides a clear timeline of what will be done and how much it will cost. Sufficient number of teams with clear capabilities they have. This team also explained about their collaboration with 2 SPO communities in Indonesia which of course would provide support and input regarding the suitability of the content produced and help promote youtube links and add subscribers. It is also advisable to give a budget to advertise with google ads or provide an explanation of the SEO strategy on youtube so that it can always appear with the right keywords.
f6_assessments.q2: It has been mentioned that this proposal is a continuation of the previous project that has received fund7, of course with the content that has been produced on the cardano Indonesia forum. After being turned into a youtube video, it is expected to be more interesting than reading, but it depends on the audience and the content promotion by the team. The evaluation and audit process will be show by increase the number of subscribers and viewers. It really deserves to give 5 stars.

f6_assessments.q0:
This is a good proposal in terms of increasing awareness of Cardano platform to a relatively new market, Indonesia. The proposers also provides detailed analysis on the problem as well as opportunity. 

In my opinion however, 6 clips ranging in length from 5 to 15 minutes are relatively insufficient for social media users to grasp the fundamental idea of Cardano ecosystem, especially when technical terms like blockchain and Cardano are still new to many,
f6_assessments.q1: The team has done good research on social media usage in recent years, and also has wide connections with KOL who can attract community within their network to widen knowledge about Cardano.  Proposer should provide more about marketing strategies,  special milestones to attract the audience to give the proposal a more reliable look. Morever, more specific information about what are the main topic of each video gonna be should be included.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal generally has good metrics. I have some metrics that the team can take into consideration:
- One metric is the number of questions the community will be asking, which implies how many people actually care about Cardano.  
- Youtube comments and feedbacks are good metrics but some people might have a question inside the chatbox on another social platform as well.
- Number of people sign up for Cardano account in Indonesian also concrete evidence to show how many actually pay attention to the platform, and how successful is the project has achieved.

f6_assessments.q0: Yes this proposal address the challenge. the simple visual infographics through videos to learn about Cardano in their local language will be really good way to bootstrap the process. It will help their people to easily learn and understand  about cardano, nfts and much more thing simply by watching videos in their local language and that will be good start to build cardano community overe there.
f6_assessments.q1: Yes the plan and the mentioned experience is sufficient to bootstrap the process and it can be implemented smoothly. They have clear plan to create good quality videos over 6 month of timeline 3 videos for 0-3 months and another 3 videos after 3-6 months.
f6_assessments.q2: Yes the information provided here is sufficient to audit the process and also the roadmap and strategy seems very clear.They have different stages as well like pre production, produciton, release  etc. The team seems experienced including project manger, developers, translators.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal aims to create 6 Youtube videos in the Indonesian language (Bahasa Indonesia), to be better able to motivate the Indonesian audience to engage more in the Cardano ecosystem.
Having traveled to Indonesia for 6 months, I can attest that the Indonesian youth don’t speak English very well, but at the same time they are very curious, creative and inventive.
Indonesia is in the top 10 countries of crypto traders in terms of total number, as such, having a series of Youtube videos about Cardano and Catalyst can be a very good starting point in their journey, especially if they are well made, both for those who already know about cryptocurrencies, and especially for those who will be new to the entire ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The plan is well detailed, structured in two phases each consisting of 3 months, with their own deliverables attached. The budget is sufficiently broken down per video and skill, as such it is easy to follow. The team has provided all the needed info about themselves, have provided ample links to their previous work, leaving no doubt about their capability to successfully implement the project.
f6_assessments.q2: The team has put together a good succession of progress metrics regarding their Youtube videos, the success has been well defined, and they also provided comprehensive info about their previous Catalyst proposals and how this one integrates with them and how all can support each other in their success.

f6_assessments.q0:
People nowadays are easily understand from video rather than text, this idea is great! Indonesian spend a lot of hours for internet and social media (source: Statista), Cardano Video Series are the best way to attract and educate Indonesian community if share accurate ways.

But, since material of discussion will grow with the Cardano's roadmap and Cryptocurrency world, Are 6 videos enough to educate the community? For example, 2020 is the year of DeFi Boom then 2021 is the year of NFT Boom. What is the next boom for 2022? 2023? Are 6 high quality videos will always cover the trend?
f6_assessments.q1: Love the idea for partnering with the relevant members! Surely, it will make the key metrics achieve success in a fast way. One of milestone said that the proposer will make "High Quality Videos". What make videos can be categorized as high quality? Contents? Social media views / traffics? If the proposer can describe "high quality videos" it will be nice (since people easily find information on the internet).
f6_assessments.q2: Kudos to author for explaining about roadmap, key metrics, and all of the success indicator of this project with basic and understandable language. Hope they can make high quality videos with understandable explanation for newbies. Also, majority of the KPIs are easy to audit publicly.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal has been approved in Fund 7 but not yet funded, and I’ve also given a similar assessment to this. Because this proposal still has the same general points, I’ll be re-iterating my previous assessment from Fund 7 for this proposal; This proposal effectively addresses the problem by providing solutions through infographic visuals rather than conventional written articles or documents. This is effective because Indonesian is known for their low literacy rate, while also having a higher amount of hours spent on social media (such as Facebook, Youtube, and Instagram). This proposal has clear key metrics and goals, such as the growth in the number of followers on social media, participants, etc. By leveraging social media, this proposal is rather flexible and can quickly adapt providing new information to the community, especially considering the ever-growing Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has a good track record and experience in their respective field. This proposal plans the budget and breaks it down into details (number of videos, posts, etc.) which proves that the proposer knows what is needed to implement this proposal. There is a roadmap explained in detail about goals and what will be done. Using social media instead of written articles proves that the proposer knows how to tackle the challenge with Indonesian people, and chose the most effective solution. Given this experience and a well-written proposal, this proposal has a high probability of being implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: This proposal has a clear roadmap with milestones laid out in detail. It also explained the indicators that are used to measure success, such as the growing number of followers on social media, the growing number of people within the community, etc. The solution to this problem is easy to understand, which then makes it easy to check after it's being implemented.

f6_assessments.q0:
Reaching out to defined audience is key to the growth and conscious ways to reach out with the need of the that group. translating cardano content for the people of Bahasa in Indonesia is a way to further localize the approach to building and expanding the catalyst ecosystem. This will meet local needs. The proposal is aligned with challenge by reach local audience in their native language.

It is equally important to provide the population dynamics of the Bahasa people to help determine and estimate the number that could be joining the catalyst school and other hubs
f6_assessments.q1:
With a high internet penetration in Indonesia, the suggested action plan is highly achievable. The team looks committed and understands their audience. 
Though the budget is not detailed enough, the requested amount is reasonable.

However, there is no sustainable plan of the proposal but it seems the You Tube channel can be monetized to generate income to keep the project running.
f6_assessments.q2:
The KPIs are clear only that they are not projected to make it easier to audit.
A qualitative estimations on the number of reach in the first 3 months and number of new onboarding could helped to facilitate the evaluation.

The proposers should also consider a monthly progressive report to inform the cardano ecosystem on success and challenges and ways to mitigate the challenges and ways to scale up success stories

solution: Provide 6 high quality educational videos and post in Cardano Indonesia's Official YouTube Channel in Indonesian Language
experience:
Business Development & Marketing, Project Management

Cardano Community : part of Eastern Town Hall Indonesia team, Cardano Community Indonesia team, Cardano Ambassador for Indonesia
